project.Title: The Mambo Hero Class mod
project.ItemDescription:
[i]The Voodoo That You Do...[/i]
[b]Backstory ------------------------------------------[/b]
"A mysterious and regal looking woman in humble clothing has arrived at the Hamlet. She claims that during a ritual, her Loa brought her a vision of a human face being enveloped in a mutilating annihilation. They have guided her here to heal this festering sore, she proclaims. And she’s not alone either. She has a pitch-black rooster in tow, which she believes to be the vessel of her late husband's soul. She may have come from low stature due to discrimination, but through the faith of her gods and cunning wit, she commands the respect of a queen." [i] - The Ancestor[/i]
[b]Role & Abilities ------------------------------------------[/b]
The Mambo is a Stress-Relieving, Enemy De-buffing Support Hero.
What she lacks in damage she makes up for in group-viability and longevity.
[u]Papa Ghede’s Blessing[/u] - Use: OOOX [b]I[/b] Target: XXXX [img]https://i.imgur.com/DiO1CTu.png[/img]
[i] Let the power of the Loa heal your mind...[/i]
A simple group stress heal, [b]excluding the Mambo herself.[/b]
[u]You Dare?![/u] - Use: XOOO [b]I[/b] Target: OOOO [img]https://i.imgur.com/UieHR1J.png[/img]
[i] How dare you attack the Great Mam’zelle![/i]
Verbal ranged attack w/ debuff to target’s damage plus lowers Stun resist.
[u]Baron Samedi’s Tobacco[/u] - Use: XOOO [b]I[/b] Target: OOOX [img]https://i.imgur.com/aOqG1uu.png[/img]
[i] Baron Samedi's vices must be indulged...[/i]
Ranged blight attack w/ DODGE debuff
[u] Papa Legba’s Shadow[/u] - Use: XOOX [b]I[/b] Target: XXXX [img]https://i.imgur.com/3UcRFMt.png[/img]
[i] Papa Legba will protect you from the Crossroads![/i]
A guard ability where the [u]entire group[/u] is guarded by her and by a Papa Legba sprite for 2 rounds and can only be used twice per battle. The more stressed she has the more PROT she has upon activation of the ability. She does, however, gain an uncurable Horror 2 rounds after the guard duration is over.
[u] Husband’s Embrace[/u] - Use: OOOX [b]I[/b] Target: XXXX [img]https://i.imgur.com/30bPBR3.png[/img]
[i] Mon cher, Christophe…[/i]
Maire hugs her [strike]husband[/strike] rooster, Christophe Glapion for a self-heal and stress-heal
[u] Baron Kriminel’s Whip[/u] - Use: OOOX [b]I[/b] Target: OOOO [img]https://i.imgur.com/WZBsgWb.png[/img]
[i] Baron Kriminel knows what lies in your hearts![/i]
Marie’s shadow whips a single target enemy. +15% DMG vs Eldritch
[u] A Little Pinprick[/u] - Use: OOOX [b]I[/b] Target: XXXX [img]https://i.imgur.com/LNS1fHu.png[/img]
[i] You must give to get, it’s the law of things.[/i]
Marie stabs herself with a dagger which removes a small portion of health and a possibility of Bleed DoT, but gives a single group member substantial stress relief and minor stress buff. Mambo also receives a healing buff for 2 rounds. [b]Mambo herself cannot be a selected recipient of the single stress heal.[/b]
[b]Camping Skills ------------------------------------------[/b]
[u]When the Rooster Crows[/u] [img]https://i.imgur.com/YSaPbaI.png[/img] Time Cost: 4
[i]Wake us if you see somethin’, mon cher...[/i]
Effect: No chance of surprise ambush while camping, 15% chance of surprising enemies (4 battles) and 10% PROT to all companions (2 battles)
[u]Gumbo Zabe[/u] [img]https://i.imgur.com/emHH80i.png[/img] Time Cost: 4
[i]This here is my Mama’s gumbo, you gon’ have the best sleep of yo’ life.[/i]
Effect: -15 stress relief (party), +10% health raise (party), +10% stress healing received and -2 ACC for next 4 battles (party)
[u]Lucky Feather[/u] [img]https://i.imgur.com/8T0qKxL.png[/img] Time Cost: 2
[i]“SQUAK!” “Oh quit yo’ fussin’, it’s just one feather.” [/i]
Effect: Gives one companion (Mambo, herself cannot be selected) +15 DODGE & +15% chance of virtue for 4 battles.
[u]Lemme Do Yo’ Hair[/u] [img]https://i.imgur.com/clbxLuX.png[/img] Time Cost: 3
[i]People always be surprised that I used to be a hairdresser.[/i]
Effect: +5 ACC to a single companion, removes morality debuff from Marie and gives her -10 stress relief.
[b]Other Information ------------------------------------------[/b]
~ Mambo is not religious ~ Provisions: Medicinal Herbs ~ District: Outside Bonfire ~ [u]Two Mambos cannot be paired together in one party[/u] ~ Mambo comes with 5 new custom Quirks: Mystic, Bokor, Inquisitor, Loa Possessed, & Samedi's Plaything ~ She is inspired by Marie Laveau and my paternal great-great-grandmother, Ma Mazey ~ Her canon default name is Marie ~ Crit Buff: +40% stress healing received ~ This mod comes with 10 class specific trinkets for Mambo: 2 common, 1 uncommon, 1 rare, 1 very rare, 2 Crimson Court and 1 Color of Madness ~ She has a town event so you can get one immediately ~ This mod is fully compatible with all 3 DLCs ~ Mambo currently only supports English translation but please message me if you wish to include your language in localization!
